name: Stellar Propeller
description:
Overview: Stellar Propeller is a single-player plane racing game where players race through various levels and dodge obstacles to try and achieve a high score. Fly through the rings to gain speed and avoid obstacles to reach the finish line. Seems easy, right? This game can be very difficult to master. Pro tip: use camera lock if you get disoriented to get back on track!

Design: Stylized, 3D Racing Game where players will race to beat their best times. Simple controls WASD, Left Click, Right Click, Spacebar.

Localization: Minimal text elements but only available in English.
